page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF GARETH
page.content: Gareth is eleven years old and has a twin brother and younger sister.He lives in a council house on the Blaenau Gwent estate. Gareth gets up at seven_thirty and after he has washed and dressed has breakfast with his family.Dad leaves at 7.45a.m. for work at Roseheyworth Pit. Gareth leaves home for school at 8.30a.m.and arrive about 8.50a.m. to do his job of putting out the chairs for assembly.When school starts the others come into assembly and then they all go to their classes.Gareth is in Class Four and will leave for the Comprehensive at the end of the year. AT lunchtime Gareth changes for Gymnastics Club,which is run after school lunch.Gareth always has school dinners.During the afternoon Gareth plays football and uses the computer.
